Letâ€™s make a new group and set up the group calendar. Navigate to the B1.church Admin dashboard then to People.
Choose Groups.
Click Add Group in the top right corner to add a group.
Choose a category name or make a new category. Give your group a name. Click add.
Click on your group name
Click the edit pencil
Fill in as much information as you like
Be sure to click save.
To add a person to the group type their name then click add.
You can also add members by leaving the search bar blank and hitting search.
Choose a person to be the leader of the group. The leader of the group is the only person who can edit the calendar. Any group member can see a list of events and comment on them.
Navigate to the drop down menu at the top right of your screen
Choose switch app
Go to B1.church
On the left side of your screen choose groups
Choose your group to edit the calendar. In this case Master's Men
Click calendar on the left hand side of the screen
Click add an event
Give the event a title
Write a short description of the event
Add a start time
And an end time
Click the recurring box if the event is recurring
You can choose intervals so the event will recur every so many days. For instance if you put three in the interval box it will repeat every third day
Or you can choose frequency by day, week or month
This event will repeat every Saturday
There are multiple ways to view the calendar, Month
Week
Day
And agenda
Click the event to see details. Members and leaders can start a conversation within the event and leaders can edit.
You can add your calendar to your google calendar (or any other calendar) by clicking subscribe. You can also make a curated calendar to add to your website. Follow the curated calendar tutorial below.
